scripts.setup: npm run install-deps && npm run reset-git && npm run build && npm install && npm run generate-config
scripts.build: (export LIB=TEMPLATE && cd native && gmake init && gmake clean && gmake && cd ..) || echo "IBM i Asset Build Failed"
scripts.generate-config: cd config && ssh-keygen -t rsa -f ./keys/jwt-private.key -N "" && mv ./keys/jwt-private.key.pub ./keys/jwt-public.key && cp development.json.sample development.json && cp development.json production.json && echo {} > testing.json && cd .. && echo "===== Base Config Generated, edit config/development.json to change system settings ====="
scripts.install-deps: ((ls /QOpenSys && yum group install "Development Tools" -y && yum install git make-gnu unzip nodejs12 unixODBC unixODBC-devel -y) || echo "Installing without Yum") && npm install -g pm2 && (ln -s /QOpenSys/pkgs/lib/nodejs12/bin/pm2 /QOpenSys/pkgs/bin/pm2 || echo "PM2 already set up")
scripts.reset-git: ((rm -rf .git && git init && git add . && git commit -am "chore(Setup): Clone Eradani JavaScript Template App v2.1.0") || echo "No remote git repo connected") && echo "===== Disconnected from template GitHub Repo. You should connect to your own with [git remote add origin <url>] ====="
